title: the Social Welfare and Pensions Act 2007 (No. 8 of 2007)) of the Pensions Act
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Trust RACs (Fees)
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Trust RACs (Fees) 

(Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 1 January 2022.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited trust racs (fees) (amendment) regulation 2021 (2) regulation come operation 1 january 2022

title: the Social Welfare and Pensions Act 2007 (No. 8 of 2007)) of the Pensions Act
heading: 2. (1) Article 3(2) (amended by article 3(1) of the Trust RACs (Fees)
text_raw:
2. (1) Article 3(2) (amended by article 3(1) of the Trust RACs (Fees) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 635 of 2010)) of the Trust RACs 
(Fees) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 768 of 2007) is amended— 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

in paragraph (a), by substituting “€12.00” for “€8.00”, 

in paragraph (b), by substituting “€6,000” for “€4,000”, and 

in paragraph (c), by substituting “€6.00” for “€4.00”. 

(2) Article 3(3) (amended by article 3(2) of the Trust RACs (Fees) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 635 of 2010)) of the Trust RACs 
(Fees) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 768 of 2007) is amended— 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

in paragraph (a), by substituting “€12.00” for “€8.00”, 

in paragraph (b), by substituting “€6,000” for “€4,000”, and 

in paragraph (c), by substituting “€6.00” for “€4.00”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Regulations. 

[773] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure and Reform, 
21 December, 2021. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 December, 2021. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection.

title: the Social Welfare and Pensions Act 2007 (No. 8 of 2007)) of the Pensions Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

Section 25 of the Pensions Act 1990 provides for the payment of annual fees 
by Trust RACs to the Pensions Authority. These Regulations provide for 
increases in the level of fees with effect from 1 January 2022.
